Package org.lavajuno.lucidjson

Interface JsonSerializable

public interface JsonSerializable
Classes can implement JsonSerializable to enable them to be easily serialized/deserialized to/from JSON strings. Only toJsonObject() and fromJsonObject() need to be implemented.

  • Method Summary

    Loads data from a JSON object into this instance.

      Serializes this instance to a JSON string.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Deserializes a JSON string into this instance.
